name: flux-angular
description: A FLUX architecture for Angular JS

scripts.build: mkdirp build && browserify ./src/flux-angular.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o ./build/flux-angular.js -x angular
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && browserify ./src/flux-angular.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o ./release/flux-angular.js -x angular && uglifyjs ./release/flux-angular.js -c -m -o ./release/flux-angular.min.js

author: Christian Alfoni
